definition: switchboard operator
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
person/employee/member

sentences.english: The telephone operator who looks up telephong(telephone) numbers uses a computer.
sentences.chinese: 電話接線員使用電腦來查詢電話號碼。

sentences.english: The receptionist schedules all the doctor's appointments twenty minutes apart.
sentences.chinese: 接線員將醫生所有的預約排程爲間隔二十分鐘。

sentences.english: Operator,I'd like to make a collet call,please.
sentences.chinese: 接線員，我要打對方付費的電話。

sentences.english: Does your area have training standards for 911 operators?
sentences.chinese: 你所在的區域有沒有給911接線員設立培訓標準呢？

sentences.english: Hello, operator. I'd like to make a person-to-person call to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 你好，接線員，我想往舊金山打個私人電話。

sentences.english: The operator told me Mr. Hinman was in charge.
sentences.chinese: 剛纔接線員告訴我是亨曼先生負責此事。

sentences.english: The operator urged him to keep driving until he reached the light at Greenville Boulevard.
sentences.chinese: 接線員敦促他將車開到格林威爾大道。

sentences.english: Operator, how do I get information in Washington ?
sentences.chinese: 接線員，華盛頓查號臺怎麼打？

sentences.english: The operator will connect you with our sales department.
sentences.chinese: 接線員將把您的電話轉接到銷售部。

sentences.english: Whpertaining to the number I gaudio-videoe you, operator?
sentences.chinese: 接線員，我給你的號碼是幾多？

sentences.english: Hello, operator, I'd like to place a long distance call to Chicago, U. S. A.
sentences.chinese: 喂，接線員，我想打長途電話到美國芝加哥。

sentences.english: The telephone operator who looks up telephone(telephone) numbers uses a computer.
sentences.chinese: 電話接線員使用電腦來查詢電話號碼。

sentences.english: Hello, operator?Could you put me through the room 102?
sentences.chinese: 你好接線員，能幫我轉接到102號房嗎？

sentences.english: Operator, please get me Bank of China, Beijing branch.
sentences.chinese: 接線員，請給我接中國銀行北京分行。

sentences.english: The operator couldn't get much out of him, except an address.
sentences.chinese: 接線員不能從他那邊獲得更多信息，除了一個地址。

definition: to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to sign/to make one's mark
to tolerate is to nurture an evildoer (idiom); spare the rod and spoil the child
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
abbr. for 國家安全局|国家安全局[Guo2 jia1 An1 quan2 ju2]
stupid and ignorant (idiom)
visitation rights (law)
to shoot without aim (idiom); fig. to speak without thinking/firing blindly/to shoot in the air/a shot in the dark
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
lit. to fall behind Sun Shan 孫山|孙山[Sun1 Shan1] (who came last in the imperial examination) (idiom)/fig. to fail an exam/to fall behind (in a competition)
fight to the death/desperate struggle
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
(idiom) to talk in a roundabout way to cover up the truth/evasive
accomplice/accessory
National Security Bureau (NSB) (Tw)/National Security Agency (NSA) (USA)
to scrutinize/to examine/to check
